TopicTitle: (1.0.4 Compatible) SSP: Space Shuttle Program (On Hold for Internal Reorganization)

Articles.Content:
Addon Page: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/134096-Space-Shuttle-Pack-Addons-page

IT'S BACK!

As you all know, Mike-NZ has turned his work on the Shuttle over to myself and a small team of developers. We will have more details as time and development moves on.

Dev Team:

Manager: Sampa

Public Relations: daedaelus

Modeling: Mike-NZ, Kartoffelkuchen

IVA: Jeast

Configuration Files:Xannari Ferrows

Texturing: Kartoffelkuchen

Testing: Commander Spock

Sounds: sp1989

Real Plume Configs:Nansuchao

Hot Rockets Configs: Felbourn

Please place any problems here or contact daedaelus. Please be respectful of us and please be exact when reporting a problem so we can correct it. Severe problems will be dealt with immediately while minor corrections will be corrected in the following release.

Latest Version: https://github.com/MrMikeNZ/Space-Shuttle/releases/tag/v1.7.9

Mirror: http://www./download/cgfbj5lwa8mgxf2/Space-Shuttle_1.7.9.zip

Please, if you have any texturing experience, please consider applying!

People with C# experience needed!

Want to help us out? please apply here.

For more news and info about our project, please visit our blog.

Do to too many issues, the One-piece has been removed. Please note that this does not include Enterprise

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/

Edited September 20, 2015 by Sampa
Felbourn is helping
Until I can model well enough, could I test the craft?
Sure, I'll add you in now, but, could you also, use a google application? daedaelus is making that right now.
Yeah I have drive.
Sampa could I do some modeling/testing?
Major, we have a way for you to apply to do so
fyi I made an application..
I don't see why you can't but, please, we provided you with a way to apply to do so!
Just did apply sorry
Ok, for the people who have already applied, could you please reapply? We discovered an error in the application and corrected it.
bam did my application
That was my fault sorry about that.

Same right here

- - - Updated - - -

Also triston look at KSC page

Same right here

- - - Updated - - -

Also triston look at KSC page

I did
We received both re-applications and they are being reviewed. There is a lot going on right now to get re-organized so bare with us in delayed responses.
I did my application too. Mike-nz can be a refernce too, I redid the ssme sounds for him and I was testing and doing the sounds for the x-15 for him.

I did my application too. Mike-nz can be a reference too, I redid the ssme sounds for him and I was testing and doing the sounds for the x-15 for him.

To be clear Mike is actually part of the team he will be able to see these applications when we review them so nobody's previous efforts will be forgotten. This is not a new mod from Mikes we just restructured the team to be far more efficient and not lay so much work on one man.

Here is a statement regarding the state of the mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/3715-State-of-the-Program

Hopefully this will get everyone up to speed specially those who may have been confused with the closure of the old thread.

A moderator is doing it on the old thread we are just waiting for it to happen.

As I've always wanted to help with a mod before, is there any small tasks (non-modeling and non-texturing) I could do? Just to kinda get me started in the field of modding.
There is an application on the OP where you can indicate what your strengths are.

There is an application on the OP where you can indicate what your strengths are.

Sampa will take care of the developer choices. But im sure you will be helpfull as you have been in the past. Any good ideas for the mod let them know and they can organise things.
I can research economics and the financial cost of the shuttles balancing for the shuttle and possibly if the ISS, gotta earn those dreams!

Definately recomended if you dont mind doing sound work like you did, or anything else

no problem just let me know what you guys need
